ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hello All
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Despite the fact that my groups have all failed at the adventures so far, I actually had alot of fun with my pick-up groups. I met some cool people and we
ygData.messageBody:
> Hi all i am 56 mage and as far as the the adventures go i love
> them...they are great aa exp even better when a 56 mage id group with
> all higher lvls i got about a yellow of aa each time and took home
> about 200p. Being a poor mage always soloing i forgot what team work
> is like, but you really need it in LDoN. I have won about 11 lost
> about 5..and those losses resulted in fools for being in the
> group..so one word of advice for people never been in lost dungen..
> bring your best friends and you will have a blast.
>
>
Despite the fact that my groups have all failed at the adventures so far, I
actually had alot of fun with my pick-up groups. I met some cool people and
we got along really well. We may not have succeeded but we all had fun and
got some decent loot.
But bringing close friends is ideal. I plan to get together with some of my
guildies next time I group.
luv,
-Su
